decks.notes: The deck focuses on generating value through a variety of powerful combo interactions, utilizing cards like Wrenn and Six, Teferi, Time Raveler and Omnath, Locus of Creation to control the board and generate advantage. The deck also includes key combo pieces like Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker and Restoration Angel for a game-winning combo. Additionally, the deck utilizes a mix of removal spells and card draw to keep the opponent in check while assembling its combo pieces. Its mana base is crafted carefully to support its multicolor requirements and to ensure consistency in its gameplay.

This deck focuses on utilizing a two-card win condition combo involving Inverter of Truth and Thassa's Oracle to win the game on the spot. The deck includes various disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek to control the opponent's hand, along with card draw spells like Opt and Jace, Wielder of Mysteries to find the combo pieces. The deck also includes some versatile removal spells like Fatal Push and Murderous Cut to deal with threats on the board. It aims to assemble the combo quickly and efficiently to secure a victory.
